tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE health_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    health_condition VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientRecords (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalTests (
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  test_date DATE,
  result VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES PatientRecords(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR,
  address VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR,
  treatment VARCHAR,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id));

CREATE TABLE LabResults (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR,
  value FLOAT,
  unit VARCHAR,
  normal_range VARCHAR,
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES MedicalRecords(record_id));

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Visits (
  visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  visit_date DATE,
  health_condition VARCHAR(255),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (visit_id, patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(100),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  prescribing_doctor VARCHAR(100),
  patient_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE LabResults (
  result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_id UUID,
  test_name VARCHAR(100),
  result_value FLOAT,
  result_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT,
  admission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT,
  recorded_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);
